backend/main.mo: Backend actor managing user registration, login, credential storage, profile creation, and role assignment with sanitization and error handling.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components, hooks, state providers, and UI modules.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component controlling auth flow, profile setup, theming, navigation, and global UI wrappers.
frontend/src/auth/authMessages.ts: Centralized auth-related messages with utilities for sanitizing, categorizing, and mapping backend errors.
frontend/src/auth/AuthProvider.tsx: Authentication context managing session restore, login, registration, logout, and backend connection handling.
frontend/src/auth/sessionStorage.ts: Utility for saving, loading, and clearing auth session data in localStorage with expiration handling and type normalization.
frontend/src/auth/useAuth.ts: Thin wrapper re-exporting the auth context hook for easier consumption.
Layout component providing a centered auth page shell with title, description, and logo.
frontend/src/components/channels/Categor: Renders a channel category with drag-and-drop channel ordering, admin-only actions, and channel creation dialog support.
frontend/src/components/channels/CreateC: Dialog for creating a new channel category with backend validation and error handling.
Dialog for creating text or voice channels within a category, including type selection and backend status checks.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatCompose: Message composer for text channels supporting send actions, enter-to-send, and backend readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatView.ts: Displays messages for the selected channel with auto-scroll, empty states, and integrated composer.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageItem: Renders a chat message with avatar, author info, timestamp, and click-to-view profile behavior.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Discov: Displays a searchable list of community servers and lets users join them.
frontend/src/components/discovery/Server: Shows a server preview card with name, description, member count, and a join button.
frontend/src/components/dms/DMHomeView.t: Shows the direct messages home view or switches to the friends view depending on navigation state.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendRo: Displays a single friend entry with avatar, name, status, and quick action buttons.
frontend/src/components/friends/FriendsH: Provides tabs for viewing friends, requests, and adding friends, with actions for managing friend requests.
frontend/src/components/layout/DesktopSh: Lays out the desktop interface with server rail, channel sidebar, main content, and optional member list.
frontend/src/components/layout/MainConte: Chooses and renders the appropriate main view based on navigation state, including chat, DMs, discovery, and settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/MobileShe: Implements the mobile layout using sheets for servers, channels, and members with a top bar and content area.
frontend/src/components/layout/Responsiv: Switches between desktop and mobile shells based on window size.
frontend/src/components/members/MemberLi: Shows a server’s member list and allows selecting a member, with each row displaying avatar and name.
frontend/src/components/nav/ChannelSideb: Displays server channel categories with drag-and-drop reordering and category creation. Integrates navigation state, server data, and ordering persistence.
frontend/src/components/nav/MobileTopBar: Renders a mobile top bar with navigation buttons and current view title. Allows opening servers, channels, members, and user settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/ServerRail.t: Shows a vertical sidebar of servers with ordering, home navigation, and server creation. Highlights the selected server and supports backend action restrictions.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Dialog prompting new users to set a display name and submit an initial profile. Handles profile creation with loading state.
frontend/src/components/profile/RoleAssi: Dialog for assigning or removing user roles in a server with pending-change tracking. Lists roles and updates assignments via mutations.
frontend/src/components/profile/UserProf: Displays a user's profile with avatar, banner, roles, and metadata, plus role management if permitted. Opens when a member is selected and supports closing and role editing.
frontend/src/components/servers/CreateSe: Dialog for creating a new server with name and description fields. Handles form submission, validation, backend restrictions, and reset on close.
frontend/src/components/servers/ServerIc: Renders a server icon image if available, otherwise shows a fallback block with the server's initial.
frontend/src/components/settings/ServerS: Dialog for creating text or voice channels, handling form input, category selection, and channel creation mutations.
Dialog allowing users to move a channel to another category, validating selection and triggering a move callback.
Panel to select a server member, view their roles, and open a dialog to manage role assignments.
Displays the server audit log with formatted events, timestamps, and error/loading states.
Manages categories and channels with ordering logic, admin-only move actions, and a dialog to create new channels.
Provides a server overview settings form allowing edits to description, banner/icon URLs, and community mode, with save support via mutation hooks.
Displays server members, lets the user select one, view their roles, and open a dialog to manage role assignments.
Allows creating new roles with names and colors and lists existing roles, integrating role creation mutations and role data loading.
Provides the main layout and navigation for server settings, switching between settings pages and handling close behavior.
frontend/src/components/settings/UserSet: Lets users change theme mode and text scale using radio buttons and a slider tied to settings state.
Displays and edits user profile fields, username, and account email using query and mutation hooks with save actions.
Provides the layout and navigation shell for user settings, switching between profile and appearance pages and supporting logout.
frontend/src/components/system/BackendCo: Shows connection status to the backend with loading, error, or hidden states, including recovery steps and retry action.
Displays a stage view with hardcoded speakers and audience lists, rendering avatars and a raise-hand button.
Shows participants in a selected voice channel, handles join/leave logic, and manages mute/deafen states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, reinitializing and invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackendActionGuard: Provides a simple guard indicating whether backend actions should be disabled based on connection state.
Determines backend connection readiness by combining safe actor initialization with a lightweight health check.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context for Internet Identity authentication, loading, login, and identity management.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsMobile.ts: Tracks window size to determine if the viewport is considered mobile.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogout.ts: Handles logout by clearing auth state and flushing the React Query cache.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines many data-fetching and mutation hooks for interacting with backend user, server, and voice-channel APIs using React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useSafeActor.ts: Safely initializes a backend actor with optional identity and retry support, handling errors and access control setup gracefully.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers plus CSS variables for dark and light themes and basic global styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with query client and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/LoginScreen.tsx: Implements sign‑in and sign‑up forms with validation, tab switching, and error handling using the auth context.
frontend/src/state/navigation.ts: Provides navigation context for tracking views, selected server/channel, tabs, and settings panels.
frontend/src/state/notifications.ts: Manages per‑server and per‑channel notification overrides persisted in localStorage.
frontend/src/state/settings.ts: Stores and updates UI settings such as theme, accent color, text scale, notifications, and keybinds with persistence.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Contains extended TypeScript interfaces matching backend structures like servers, channels, messages, and roles.
frontend/src/utils/channelOrdering.ts: Utilities for applying and generating channel and category ordering based on persisted server ordering data.
frontend/src/utils/hideElementByXPath.ts: Functions to remove a DOM element via XPath and observe for reinsertions to keep it hidden.
frontend/src/utils/roleColor.ts: Provides utilities to sanitize hex role colors, detect lightness, and choose a contrasting text color.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-backed parameters.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Wraps a promise with a timeout, rejecting if it doesn't resolve within the given duration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, color variables, breakpoints, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing current project state, known issues, and role-assignment fix requirements for registration.
